General.Name: Seah Steel Corp
General.Description: SeAH Steel Corporation manufactures and sells steel products in South Korea. It offers steel pipes, conduit pipes, structural steel pipes, material pipes, stainless steel pipes, titanium steel pipes, etc. The company's pipes are used in oil pipelines and oil wells, and boilers and heat exchangers. SeAH Steel Corporation was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
